objects.name: Analytic 0613
objects.description: Detection of Linux container escape attempts via syscalls (`unshare`, `keyctl`, `mount`) or process execution outside container namespaces. Defenders may correlate unusual system calls from containerized processes with subsequent process creation on the host or modification of host resources.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: unshare, mount, keyctl, setns syscalls executed by containerized processes

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: linux:Sysmon
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: process creation events linked to container namespaces executing host-level binaries

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Expected syscalls by containerized workloads. Deviations may signal an escape attempt.
Defines correlation window (e.g., 60s) between suspicious syscalls and follow-on host process activity.
